ygData.subject: RE: [sg-everquest] For Fesse, Merns and gang
ygData.msgSnippet: I m also innocent.  I just come back from a 2 week trips and this thing happened out of nowhere.  No body wanan tell me what happened (I asked in private many
ygData.messageBody:
I'm also innocent. I just come back from a 2 week trips and this thing
happened out of nowhere. No body wanan tell me what happened (I asked in
private many times, pple either tell me they dunno or just dun wanna talk
abt it), yet I kena screwed for nothing (damn u BB, soemore I'm the 1st on
ya screw list, hehe).

Whatever happened is over. What Alex said is true, S'pore is such a small
world, why fight amg ourselves. That's the reason why I setup the
SG_Online_RPGers mailing list for our local kakis, hopefully we can share
MMORPG info and help one another in the game, and hopefully get as many
S'porean as possible to join the same server whenever possible. To
subscribe, pls send an empty mail to:
SG-Online-RPGers-subscribe@egroups.com
(Wowow, thx for the opportunity to advertise my list, muhahahahah!!!) But
I'm telling the truth? When if all the S'porean players join a server, we
are still a minority (just like s'pore on earth, so small), we got more and
better target out there to fight, why fight mg ourselves???

Anyway to be frank lah, I hope we dun forget why we setup the guild in the
1st place. Ask yaself, are we closer or further from our initial
objective? For me, my objective to form a guild is simple: to gather all
local kakis and help one another, to promote the reputation of S'porean
players in the server. Like in UO, there are certain very good
Korean/Japan players when the game first started, so when we talked abt
them, we know they are good. Same here, I really hope that when pple talk
of S'porean players one day, they think we are good and reputatable.

There is no right or wrong in this arguement, since I dunno what is wrong
and why the damn thing started in the first place (KNN CCB KNS OCBC POSB
DBS CPF PCB etc to those who start this thing, get me screwed for nothing
and didnt tell me why, LOL). Either we all forget abt it, let bygones be
begones, be good friends again (well, I'm sure we will meet again in
Horizon) or let meet somewhere else in RL and settle everything once and
for all ;) At least this is better than letting the whole Inno population
know that within a S'porean founded grp, S'poreans fight amg ourselves ;((

SOMEONE TELL ME WTF IS HAPPENING???

Zil.

p/s: Also, where to read the k-po postings? Which board? ;P
